ingredients.ingredient: 1 (7 ounce) container shake and pour buttermilk pancake mix

cookingTips: Use cold beer to keep batter light and create carbonation bubbles for crispiness
Pat fish dry before dipping to help batter adhere
Fry at 350°F for 3-4 minutes until golden brown and crispy
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide me through making crispy beer batter using carbonation for light, airy coating on delicate fish.
